alert.note: Alert for Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 22 at 11:54AM MDT until March 22 at 4:00PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 PM MDT THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Snow. Light snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains, particularly on I-80 between approximately milepost 20 through milepost 80. * WHEN...Until 4 PM MDT this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Plan on winter driving conditions.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For graphical depictions of the snowfall forecast, including Official NWS Forecast, High End Amount, and Low End Amount, visit weather.gov/slc/winter. For winter road conditions from the Utah Department of Transportation, visit http://www.udottraffic.utah.gov/roadweatherforecast.aspx.

area.areaDesc: Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains
